name: Tesla: The Weather Man
description: Wield weather control powers to defeat a crazed Thomas Edison and his army of DC-powered robots, in a physics-based action/puzzle platformer with researchable upgrades and bad jokes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or later Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card or integrated graphics with DirectX 9 Shader Model 2.0 support (practically anything since 2005) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 800 MB available space
